name: Inaris "Claret" Pickaxe
description: The Inaris "Claret" Pickaxe is a Workshop Pickaxe geared towards combat, intrinsically dealing fire damage to targets. Since the Inaris "Claret" Pickaxe has the same mining radius and yield as theLarkwell Martinez Pickaxe, Prospectors are better off using theInaris "Neves" Pickaxefor mining.
